name: Harry Potter & The Chamber Of Secrets REMAKE
name_original: Harry Potter & The Chamber Of Secrets REMAKE
description:
I decided to rework some of the levels of The Chamber Of Secrets game for fun, as the game is very dated, I use the Unreal Engine to give it new life. The result is excellent. I tried to make it as realistic as possible. 
The game is in W.I.P. and I will upload levels as I make them. Some will be single levels, others entire maps. 
For now I've started with the Dueling Club dueling system. For now I have imported and reprogrammed Harry and Draco. Maybe I'll import some more later.
